title: Architectural Design Project
subtitle: Residential Building Plans
description: This project involved creating detailed architectural plans for a modern residential building in Cavite, Philippines. The design focused on maximizing natural light while maintaining privacy in an urban setting.

steps.title: Client Consultation
steps.description: Met with the client to understand their needs, preferences, and budget constraints.

steps.title: Site Analysis
steps.description: Conducted measurements and analyzed the building site's conditions and constraints.

items.title: Limited Space
items.description: The building site was relatively small for the client's requirements. I optimized the layout using space-saving techniques.
